pkgmetadata.longdescription: Using the uSWID tool or Python API allows one to create, convert and merge Software Bill of Materials (SBoM) metadata to and from a number of different formats including SWID, coSWID, CycloneDX, SPDX and goSWID. It can also import SBoM metadata from .ini files, pkgconfig files, PE binaries including EFI ones, and various unspecified firmware files as long as they include the coSWID SBoM header. Last but not least, it can be used to embed coSWID SBoM metadata into PE/EFI binaries.
